channel.title: Process on Known Unknowns
channel.description: Recent content in Process on Known Unknowns

item.title: What are the rules!
item.description: Harking back to our golden tri-force of process, product and culture I wanted to discuss today; process. And like a high school level research paper let’s start with a google definition: “[Process] is a series of actions or steps taken in order to achieve a particular end.” That’s pretty straight forward. You could compare it to a function in mathematics, given an input \(A\) how do you get to output \(B\).
